alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Madison (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 15 at 4:01PM CDT until May 15 at 4:30PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL JACKSON AND SOUTHEASTERN MADISON COUNTIES... At 401 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near South Pittsburg to near Hollywood to near Gurley, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Southern Huntsville, Scottsboro, Bridgeport, Stevenson, Owens Cross Roads, Hollywood, Skyline, Gurley, Woodville and Pisgah. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
